name: Bulwark Guard
desc:
Reduce damage unit takes by 80% and gain Brave effect when unit has a magical weapon and the enemy has a physical weapon.
Also gain the same effect in the opposite situation.
components: (item_funcs.is_magic(target, target.get_weapon()) and not item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon())) or (not item_funcs.is_magic(target, target.get_weapon()) and item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()))
